name: I love Andy Milonakis
reviewBody:
This show is SO hilarious everyone that I know that has seen it absolutely loves it now. anyone that says otherwise, you must not find many things funny. I loved it and he is know one of my new heroes :D how can you not like the segments of the show? they are odd, yes, but because of that, it makes it interesting and I love how he delivers jokes and he thinks of his own ideas. He's kind of like Chris Farley as a child, with weirder thoughts. and slightly crazier.

so yep, give it a second chance. it's fabulous.

my friend wants to say something: The Andy Milonakis show is PURE genius. If you don't think so, you deserve to have your eyeballs scooped out with a rusty melon baller. have a nice day :).
